User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the LearnPath Pro application, including their role and basic profile information. Authentication details are handled by an external system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

username.description: A unique username chosen by the user.

email.description: The user's email address, used for identification.

role.description: The assigned role of the user within the application (e.g., Student, Teacher, Admin).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

CareerPath.title: CareerPath
CareerPath.description: Defines a specific career trajectory or professional goal, which can be mapped to various learning paths.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CareerPath entity.

name.description: The name of the career path (e.g., 'Full-stack Web Developer').

description.description: A detailed description of the career path, outlining its scope and objectives.

learningPathIds.description: References to LearningPath entities associated with this career path. (Relationship: CareerPath N:N LearningPath)

LearningPath.title: LearningPath
LearningPath.description: A structured collection of modules designed to guide users through a specific learning journey towards a career path.

id.description: Unique identifier for the LearningPath entity.

name.description: The name of the learning path (e.g., 'Introduction to Python Programming').

description.description: A summary of what the learning path covers and its objectives.

sourceUrl.description: The URL to the primary source of content for this learning path, typically a GitHub repository or specific directory.

careerPathIds.description: References to CareerPath entities that this learning path contributes to. (Relationship: LearningPath N:N CareerPath)

moduleIds.description: References to Module entities that constitute this learning path, ordered sequentially. (Relationship: LearningPath N:N Module)

Module.title: Module
Module.description: Represents an individual learning unit or topic within a learning path, often corresponding to a file or folder in the source repository.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Module entity.

name.description: The title of the module (e.g., 'Variables and Data Types').

description.description: A brief description of the module's content and learning outcomes.

contentUrl.description: The URL to the actual content file or resource for this module (e.g., a Markdown file on GitHub).

aiSummary.description: An AI-generated summary of the key learning points from the module's content.

learningPathIds.description: References to LearningPath entities that this module is a part of. (Relationship: Module N:N LearningPath)

skillIds.description: References to Skill entities that are taught or reinforced by this module. (Relationship: Module N:N Skill)

Skill.title: Skill
Skill.description: Defines a specific competency or ability that can be learned, assessed, and tracked.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Skill entity.

name.description: The name of the skill (e.g., 'Object-Oriented Programming', 'Data Analysis').

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the skill entails and its relevance.

SkillAssessment.title: SkillAssessment
SkillAssessment.description: Records the results of a user's skill assessment, including their performance and AI-generated feedback.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SkillAssessment entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User who undertook the assessment. (Relationship: User 1:N SkillAssessment)

skillId.description: Reference to the Skill that was assessed. (Relationship: Skill 1:N SkillAssessment)

assessmentDate.description: The date and time when the skill assessment was completed.

score.description: The numerical score obtained in the assessment (e.g., a percentage or rating).

feedback.description: AI-generated personalized feedback and suggestions for improvement based on the assessment results.

suggestedModuleIds.description: References to Module entities recommended for the user to improve the assessed skill. (Relationship: SkillAssessment N:N Module)

UserModuleProgress.title: UserModuleProgress
UserModuleProgress.description: Tracks a specific user's progress and interaction status with individual learning modules.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserModuleProgress entity.

userId.description: Reference to the User whose progress is being tracked. (Relationship: User 1:N UserModuleProgress)

moduleId.description: Reference to the Module for which progress is being tracked. (Relationship: Module 1:N UserModuleProgress)

status.description: The current progress status of the user for this module (e.g., 'Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed').

completionDate.description: The date and time when the user completed this module, if applicable.

lastAccessedDate.description: The last date and time the user accessed or interacted with this module.

Meeting.title: Meeting
Meeting.description: Represents a live meeting session between students and teachers.

participants.description: User IDs of people currently in the meeting.

definition.description: Stores individual user profiles and their assigned roles.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: careerPathId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific career path.

params.name: learningPathId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific learning path.

params.name: moduleId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific learning module.

params.name: skillId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific skill.

definition.description: Records individual user's skill assessment results.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user who owns this assessment.

params.name: skillAssessmentId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific skill assessment record.

definition.description: Tracks a specific user's progress through modules.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user whose progress is being tracked.

params.name: userModuleProgressId
params.description: The unique identifier for a specific user module progress record.

params.name: meetingId
